projectPurpose: To provide unofficial Chinese language localization for the Notion desktop application.
mainFeatures: Applies Chinese language interface to Notion desktop application
Enables Chinese UI for users who prefer the desktop client

alternatives.name: Notion Official Localization
mainFeatures: Available across all official Notion platforms
Officially supported and updated by Notion Labs, Inc.

marketPositioning: notion-zh_CN positions itself as a community-led initiative to bring Chinese localization to the Notion desktop application, likely serving users who needed Chinese support before official options were comprehensive or available, or who prefer a community version. It acts as a patch or tool to modify the official client, differentiating it from Notion's built-in language settings which are part of the official product offering.
